entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 90. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
